#### About me

Welcome! I am Ph.D. student working on political economy and political behavior in Latin America at The University of Maryland, College Park. My research interests include crime, environmental and disaster politics, and political violence. To study these topics, I use a mix-methods approach: causal inference, social networks analysis, and fieldwork.

You can find my CV <a href="https://www.dropbox.com/s/wqk62qgyw9fusc3/Juan_Gelvez_Ferreira_CV.pdf?dl=0">here</a>.
